sub_title: Co-founder TrueStreams Technologies Pvt. Ltd - CFO @ Tyso Entertainment Ltd - Advisory Board Strategy & Operations
summary:
We are building our network on the highest quality standards. 
Not only Broadcasting Video, Audio and Pictures. Also Health care, Medical, Military, E-learning, Corporates, Art, Photography, Cinema, Events, Surveillance. Studio quality picture and sound. Highest content protection. Highest Privacy protection. Highest throughput within lowest Bandwidth.
No longer compressed streaming and high costs for decoding hardware and services.
Show the audience what is produced.
You won't believe it until you see it.

Websites : 
http://www.trustreaming.com
http://www.tysoco.com
True Streams & Tyso are ready for integration Core Technology and collaboration.
Meet us @ IBC 2015 in Dubai and Amsterdam.

Available products :
1. Core Technology xHS Hyper Streaming Framework for TrueHD 4K video & audio.
2. Core Technology xSPF Single Player Framework for all codecs.
3. Technology VJ-Casting for Broadcast Video & Audio.
4. Technology 120FLiX Solution for digital distribution Movies & TV Shows.
5. Tyso Social Media - connection to the world - V-cast & J-cast for Video & Audio included.
6. Total Surveillance in real picture and sound. Best recognition for investigation purpose.

Ongoing developments True Streams Technologies.

Operating devices :
All devices over IP.
PC, Laptop, Tablet, TV, Mobiles, with required specs.

projects.description:

Most important Content Protection, covered by own developed 3 layered Shell Protection.
No downloads unless creator or copyright owner wants to allow this.
No copy, No Piracy, No illegal downloads.
Highest Audio Bit-rate (28.600 Kbps)
Lossless Streaming Format.
Studio Quality delivered. (WYUIWYG)
Lossless HD Audio. Cinematic Surround Sound up to 7.1 Channel.
Only copyright owners can sell their content to their audience and fans.
Music can be promoted complete with Video (24 streams Picture Sound & Language)

projects.title: True V-Cast – Broadcasting to Global Audiences with TrueStreams
projects.description:
READY FOR USE : True V-Cast is B2B feature from TrueStreams for live streaming studio productions to global audiences. Used by TV stations, Internet Service Providers, Film & VOD Services. 
Differences with current streaming models are: 
No Satellite needed, 3 layered Shell Content Protection, No hacking, No Piracy, No Downloads, No illegal Copy, Streaming in Blu-ray quality, 4K UHD streaming, True HD video & audio streaming, 24 tracks for picture, sound & subtitles in same time.
Advertisement with mix of 24 different subtitles and language for each region in same time. Streams up to 120 Frames per Second. Streams up to 28.600 Kbps Audio.

contributors.headline: Co-founder TrueStreams Technologies Pvt. Ltd - CFO @ Tyso Entertainment Ltd - Advisory Board Strategy & Operations

projects.title: Essentials for Broadcasting & Cinema - 120FLiX - TrueStreams
projects.description:
What do you expect visiting a Cinema or following broadcasted productions?
1. Wide screen
2. High quality of picture
3. Detailed motion
4. Voice in your language if subtitles are original.
5. Subtitles in your language if voice is original
6. Music and sound in original produced Studio quality. Detailed Emotion.
Why reducing all this when looking afterwards in broadcasted creations or VOD?

Now it is possible to broadcast the originals.
Streaming no longer needed in 30 Frames per Second. We allow streaming in 120 fps.
Pixels no longer needed in HD (720p or 1080p). We allow upto 8000p.
All current broadcasters use Dolby Digital. We allow broadcasting in True HD and DTS HDMA, 7.1 channel.
Music no longer needed in 645 Kbps. We allow upto 28000 Kbps.
Voice no longer needed in original produced language. Change voice on the fly in your language.
Subtitles no longer needed in 1 chosen subtitle. Change subtitles on the fly in your language.
Local reach no longer needed. We allow worldwide reach and spread.

We are ready for B2B. Leaving the competition behind.
Contact Us for the biggest deal ever.

Specialty for the Cine Industry and Broadcasters. 120FLiX - trueStreams - ready to Market

contributors.headline: Co-founder TrueStreams Technologies Pvt. Ltd - CFO @ Tyso Entertainment Ltd - Advisory Board Strategy & Operations

projects.title: Marketplace for creative Artists
projects.description:
Marketplace offers artists direct contact with their audience - connected to all Social Networks.
Creators with ownership of copyright have the choice of free presentation or to use Marketplace.
In this way they can serve their audience and make profit out of their work.
Only a few possibilities are open to use in this realms.

Our idea is based on connecting the artist to the audience.
Until now almost only youtube offers the possibility to upload content for big audiences, but total profit is mostly taken by the organiser, not the artist.

The biggest problem for artists is that no one cares about their personal rights, 
as long they are profitably exploited. Most artists are dependent on managers. 

There are too few possibilities for upcoming and existing artists. 
Not only artists in music, film and other entertainment, but also writers, painters, photographers, sportsman, designers and many more. 
Mobile applications are the future and this will grow faster every year. 
Most providers have to make a lot as not all content can be uploaded in normal ways - with big server parks needing to be maintained and kept operational. 

We have an existing worldwide network and we only have to implement this app in Vi-Core. 
Uploading all content is possible in original produced quality. 
Streaming without compromise. 

Our plan consists of the following: 
1. Create app for use on mobiles and tablets for all existing operating systems. 
2. Create Marketplace inside the app. 
3. Create connection plugins to all existing social networks. 
4. Give artists the opportunity to reach their audience. 
5. Give the audience the opportunity to connect with artists. 
6. Offer the possibility to download interesting work from preferred artists. 
7. Offer artists the opportunity to profit from downloads. 
8. Offer the audience the opportunity to share, like, dislike, comment, and flag. 
9. Profit remains only for the artists with rights to display their content.

contributors.headline: Co-founder TrueStreams Technologies Pvt. Ltd - CFO @ Tyso Entertainment Ltd - Advisory Board Strategy & Operations

projects.title: Tyso Network
projects.description:
Tyso Network is based on ideas from Marco Leferink and Benjamin Samson. 
This network offers all possibilities to share everything you want in 100% private area,
and also in public if you want. 

For sharing you can think on all things in life that is connected to Business and Entertainment. 

For impression look at the Website and the Manual on the webpage and try it out. 
In the User Manual the Network is completely explained in 65 pages.
In the Software FAQ is completely explained about the Social app in Tyso Network. 120 Q+A.
In the Web FAQ is explained how to use.

For experience the possibilities and quality difference you have to subscribe.
After verification E-mail address you can access the Public Area.
After adding friends you can access Private Area.
Without adding friends you can upload own content and experience what is possible now.

There is only 1 subscription possible on 1 PC.
Now it is possible to use on Windows Operating Systems. Other systems follow soon.
Mobile systems and tablets will follow by year 2014.

contributors.headline: Co-founder TrueStreams Technologies Pvt. Ltd - CFO @ Tyso Entertainment Ltd - Advisory Board Strategy & Operations

projects.title: Lossless Online Streaming - TrueStreams delivering reality
projects.description:
Lossless streaming was impossible until now and therefore only compressed streaming at a low frame rate has been used, necessarily, by competitors. 

Its not only the number of pixels that counts.
More important for live streaming on big screen is the frame rate per second. 
We are ready for 4K TV and streaming up to 120 fps.

We have the solution for this problem. 
Our streaming protocol in this case is unique and we do not need to compress or re-encode. 

The original quality of content can be smoothly streamed in a lossless manner up to 24 streams, audio and video, at same time - as well as being able to change language and subtitles on the fly. 

Quality like Blu-ray.

This streaming possibility turns your PC into a Home Cinema Thater for True HD on big screens.

contributors.headline: Co-founder TrueStreams Technologies Pvt. Ltd - CFO @ Tyso Entertainment Ltd - Advisory Board Strategy & Operations

projects.title: Tyso Social Media - previous called Tyso Vi-Core - incl. Live Social
projects.description:
Tyso Social (previous Tyso Vi-Core) is client-host software to establish Tyso Network, Cross Share Content from Facebook, YouTube Videos and more.

Tyso Social is a software program which turns your home PC to a surveillance center.
Webcams and other devices can be seen with Tyso Video Viewer software. 
Record and Stream your live shows and create Events. 
Tyso Social function as a host in Tyso Network, Tyso Video Viewer will be the client. 

Tyso Social has multiple features. 
Content is stored on multiple storage devices, even connected with Bluetooth. 

C-profiles is a separate product for Business.

Tyso Social offers users to upload Blu-ray files in Your Channel and share to watch in private. 

Tyso Media Center supports Blu-ray 3D.
Tyso Free on Air Radio and TV.

Business meetings, Education, tutorials, lessons, seminars, congresses on long distance. 

Connection with ill people in Hospital. 
Contact with the elderly in health care centers and nursing homes. 

Adjust Video settings, Audio settings, VST effects for YouTube videos, Video Converter, User File Manager, smart TV, video control for YouTube and streaming. 

Tyso supports Bluetooth streaming.
Support for IR, WiFi, even files in your WII Remote can be added to the shared streaming content.

Tyso Social provides a built-in YouTube Manager.

Tyso Video Viewer software to view live shows and explore exclusive content. Tyso Video Viewer connects with the Tyso Social to build a secured and encrypted connection. Enjoy cross shared YouTube Videos into Tyso Network by Tyso YouTube Manager.

Tyso Home Spy Assistance is software which supports offline and online security system.

Tyso Media Center is media player software. TMC is compatible with all audio and video codec’s including Blu-ray and offers enhanced audio and video. Different presets can be chosen for best output in audio and video, TMC supports 7.1 digital audio and HD1080i.
